required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical And Cost- Effectiveness of Allium Sativum Oil (Garlic Oil ) Versus Mineral Trioxide Aggregate in Primary Molars Pulpotomy in Group of Egyptian Children : A Randomised Clinical Pilot Study.
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical And Cost- Effectiveness of Allium Sativum Oil Versus Mineral Trioxide Aggregate in Primary Molars Pulpotomy in Group of Egyptian Children : A Randomised Clinical Pilot Study.

brief_summary.textblock: Allium Sativum oil is advocated to prove the capability of new natural products in replacing higher cost pharmacological materials, while achieving the same successful clinical and radiographic long-term results.

detailed_description.textblock: One of the most challenging subjects in paediatric dentistry is choosing the ideal pulp medication material that has the required properties such as preserving the vitality of the remaining intact pulp and stimulating its repair. This material should prevent pathological root resorption.Clinical and cost effectiveness trials from different countries are useful to determine which medicament should be advocated in which economic setting . Alternative pulpotomy materials clinically effective as MTA but with lower cost should be studied .

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: It is a double-blinded randomised clinical trial with equal randomisation parallel design with allocation ratio 1:1
study_design_info.masking_description: participants and outcome assessor will be blinded (double blind study )

primary_outcome.description: clinical effectiveness will be measured by intraoral examination and radiographic assessment

secondary_outcome.description: cost-effectiveness will be measured with incremental cost-effectiveness ratio (ICER)

arm_group.description: The pulp stumps of the molars are dressed with a cotton pellet that is made damp with Allium Sativum oil for 1 min .
The material will be prepared according to the manufacturer's instructions , applied to the pulp chamber and a moistened cotton pellet was placed over the MTA paste to allow the material to set.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Apparently healthy children aged from 5- 7 years.
- Children not having antibiotics in the past 14 days.
- Cooperative children.
- Children are having at least two carious asymptomatic second primary molars.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Uncooperative children.
- Immunocompromised children.
- Children with clinical or radiographic symptoms
